duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide a personalized client experience and build strong client relationships in a retail environment.
Meet individual and store sales targets and consignment goals.
Incorporate product knowledge in the sales process to improve sales performance.
Capture and manage relevant customer information for database entry.
Promote store events through email, phone, and personalized notes.
Assist in general housekeeping and maintenance of the store image.
Support shipping and receiving, as well as inventory control as requested.
